Jargon Term: recent change in your diuretic medication
It is very important that you continue to eat and drink on a daily basis while you are on a diurectic medication.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Diet

Jargon Term: Weigh yourself every morning, [**Name8 (MD) 138**] MD if weight goes up more than 3 lbs or decreases by more than 3 lbs.
